text:
SRC		=	Agenda.cpp \
			Task.cpp \
			CmdExecutor.cpp \
			main.cpp

OBJ		=	$(SRC:.cpp=.o)

NAME		=	agenda

RM		=	rm -f

CFLAGS		+=	-W -Wall -Wextra -pedantic -Werror -std=14

CC		=	g++

all:	 		$(NAME)

$(NAME):		$(OBJ)
			$(CC) $(OBJ)  -o $(NAME)

clean:
			$(RM) $(OBJ)

fclean:			clean
			$(RM) $(NAME)

re:			fclean all

.PHONY:			all clean fclean re
